ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class LocalResources

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.LocalResources

  • public class LocalResources
extends java.lang.Object
    Static resources available to all classes via the import line: import static ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Resources.*;

    This class stores information for the robot (eg, BASE_WIDTH) and contains the object instances of various tools, such as a Search object, Attachment, etc. This class also contains the methods and information necessary to update its game parameters via wifi.

    Author:
    Ryan Au auryan898@gmail.com

      • SERVER_IP

        public static final java.lang.String SERVER_IP
        The IP address of the server that transmits data to the robot. For the beta demo and competition, replace this line with

        public static final String SERVER_IP = DEFAULT_SERVER_IP;
